Class EngineServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ephesoft.dcma.workflows.service.engine.impl.EngineServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EngineService

    public class EngineServiceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements EngineService
    This class represents the implementation of Engine service for a third party workflow engine.
